page.title: 10A Favourite Game.
page.content: My{favourite game}is{Bull Dogs.}We always play on the grass so that we do not get hurt too much.We run round the front of our school and the last one round is "on".He picks a boy or a girl and says the name.That person has to try to run past the one who's on and reach the trees without getting caught.If you do not get past the person and he manages to get your shoulder down for the count of ten then you join the catching side.If he does not get you down you run past him and get to the trees then it is "BULLDOGS AWAY". Everybody tries to go past the trees.If the{catcher}catches any one, then they're on.The game finishes when there is only one person to be caught and the rest are all{chasers.
